    mancala

      ServerOutputController SocketManager.listen()
      Method which listens the server output.
      Methods in mancala with parameters of type ServerOutputController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ControllerMancala.handleBoard(ServerOutputController response)
      Method which handle a board, that is to say each turn the players receive the new board.
      void ControllerMancala.handleError(ServerOutputController response)
      Method which handle an error sent by the server.
      void ControllerMancala.handleInit(ServerOutputController response)
      Method which handle an initialization, toggle different menus, reset the game and reverse the board for player 2
      void ControllerMancala.handleResponse(ServerOutputController response)
      Method which triggers a different method according to the type of the response
      void ControllerMancala.handleRound(ServerOutputController response)
      Method which handle the end of a round.
      void ControllerMancala.handleWinLose(ServerOutputController response)
      Method which handle the end of a game.
